background: Establishing new photo monitoring surveys that will replace fixed wing waterfowl surveys.
title: Monitoring Waterfowl Abundance with Camera Traps
assumptions: Waterfowl will positively respond to moist soil management activities and management with associated uplands.

metrics.title: Total estimation of waterfowl in TD-1 project in winter/spring migration

objectives: To effectively monitor waterfowl use using camera traps throughout late winter and spring migration.
